an8.26:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati jīvakambavane.
an8.26:1.2: Atha kho jīvako komārabhacco yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho jīvako komārabhacco bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an8.26:1.4: “Yato kho, jīvaka, buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti;
an8.26:2.2: “Yato kho, jīvaka, upāsako pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti …pe… surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti;
an8.26:2.3: ettāvatā kho, jīvaka, upāsako sīlavā hotī”ti.
an8.26:3.1: “Kittāvatā pana, bhante, upāsako attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāyā”ti?
an8.26:3.2: “Yato kho, jīvaka, upāsako attanāva saddhāsampanno hoti, no paraṃ saddhāsampadāya samādapeti …pe…
an8.26:3.3: attanāva atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti, no paraṃ dhammānudhammappaṭipattiyā samādapeti.
an8.26:3.4: Ettāvatā kho, jīvaka, upāsako attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāyā”ti.
an8.26:4.1: “Kittāvatā pana, bhante, upāsako attahitāya ca paṭipanno hoti parahitāya cā”ti?
an8.26:4.2: “Yato kho, jīvaka, upāsako attanā ca saddhāsampanno hoti, parañca saddhāsampadāya samādapeti;
an8.26:4.3: attanā ca sīlasampanno hoti, parañca sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
an8.26:4.4: attanā ca cāgasampanno hoti, parañca cāgasampadāya samādapeti;
an8.26:4.5: attanā ca bhikkhūnaṃ dassanakāmo hoti, parañca bhikkhūnaṃ dassane samādapeti;
an8.26:4.6: attanā ca saddhammaṃ sotukāmo hoti, parañca saddhammassavane samādapeti;
an8.26:4.7: attanā ca sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhāraṇajātiko hoti, parañca dhammadhāraṇāya samādapeti;
an8.26:4.8: attanā ca sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti, parañca atthūpaparikkhāya samādapeti;
an8.26:4.9: attanā ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti, parañca dhammānudhammappaṭipattiyā samādapeti.
an8.26:4.10: Ettāvatā kho, jīvaka, upāsako attahitāya ca paṭipanno hoti parahitāya cā”ti.
